about

I work for Slack as a Platform Support Agent and I love it. I get to help developers use our API to connect their services. It's an amazing role and I get to work with amazing people.


My main focus is to learn to code better as I find my work and my passions revolve around it. It helps with my work as I can develop more empathy for our developers, understanding how our documentation should flow, give better feedback, develop better troubleshooting skills.. the labelst goes on! But I just enjoy it really!


This website is to showcase projects but more specifically the learnings I go on. I'm trying to make sure that I add the steps I take within a readme for each project, or / and a blog post here and there. I wish I had done this a long time ago as I have done so much stuff that I haven't tracked very well.

my values:


Check out this post if you want to know more about why I built this site!
